name: Thanos
origin: Thanos is a powerful Titanian Eternal with a thirst for universal domination. Obsessed with balancing the universe, he seeks out the Infinity Stones to achieve his goal of wiping out half of all life.
powers: Thanos possesses superhuman strength, durability, and intelligence. With the Infinity Stones, he gains control over time, space, reality, and more, granting him god-like powers.
events: Search for the Infinity Stones, Destruction of Xandar, Battle with the Avengers, Snap of the Infinity Gauntlet, Blip and Return, Final Confrontation with the Avengers.
allies: Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian, Proxima Midnight, Corvus Glaive.
enemies: The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Doctor Strange, Spider-Man.
